Name_must_be_at_least_characters_long: Name must be at least 3 characters long
Namemust_be_less_than_characters: Name must be less than 50 characters
Country_code_must_be_between_1_to_4_digi: Country code must be between 1 to 4 digits
Phone_number_must_be_at_least_8_digits: Phone number must be at least 8 digits
Phone_number_must_not_exceed_15_digits: Phone number must not exceed 15 digits
Phone_number_must_contain_only_digits: Phone number must contain only digits
Please_provide_a_valid_email_address: Please provide a valid email address
Email_must_contain_only_letters_digits_a: Email must contain only letters, digits, and periods before @
Password_must_be_at_least_6_characters_l: Password must be at least 6 characters long
type_must_be_either_forget_or_forget: type must be either forget or forget
Invalid_User_ID_format_Must_be_a_valid_M: Invalid User ID format. Must be a valid MongoDB ObjectId
Invalid_time_format_Must_be_in_HH_mm_for: Invalid time format. Must be in HH:mm format (e.g., 18:42)
Date_must_be_a_valid_ISO_format: Date must be a valid ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD)
Date_cannot_be_in_the_past: Date cannot be in the past
Title_must_be_at_least_Word_long: Title must be at least 1 Word long
Prayer_Request_must_be_at_least_words_lo: Prayer Request must be at least 3 words long
Invalid__id_format_Must_be_a_valid_Mongo: Invalid _id format. Must be a valid MongoDB ObjectId
your_account_is_inactive_Please_contact_: your account is inactive. Please contact to admin.
your_account_is_unverified_Please_verify: your account is unverified . Please verify your email
Internal_server_error_while_fetching_use: Internal server error while fetching user details.
Otp_is_sent_to_your_register_email_pleas: Otp is sent to your register email please verify the email
OTP_has_expired_Please_request_a_new_OTP: OTP has expired. Please request a new OTP.
Incorrect_OTP_Please_enter_the_correct_O: Incorrect OTP. Please enter the correct OTP.
Look_like_you_enter_same_password: Look like you enter same password
you_have_already_uploaded_a_prayer_on: you have already uploaded a prayer on
You_can_upload_your_next_prayer_tomorrow: You can upload your next prayer tomorrow.
Access_denied_Please_log_in_to_continue: Access denied. Please log in to continue
Old_Password_must_be_at_least_6_characte: Old Password must be at least 6 characters long
New_Password_must_be_at_least_6_characte: New Password must be at least 6 characters long
